languages.text: "Слишком привык к шлемам арбитров — они не закрывают нижнюю часть лица. А что касается здоровья... Да плевать, честно говоря".
"I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."
languages.original_text: "Слишком привык к шлемам арбитров — они не закрывают нижнюю часть лица. А что касается здоровья... Да плевать, честно говоря".

traits.locale_text: "I am too used to the arbitrator helmets, they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I could not care less."
"I am too used to the arbitrator helmets, they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I could not care less."
"I am too used to the Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I could not care less."
"I am too used to the Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I could not care less."
"I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."
"I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

languages.text: 「アービトレイターのヘルメットに慣れすぎてしまって、あれは顔の下半分を覆わないんだよな。自分の健康については…正直なところ、全然気にしてない」
languages.original_text: "I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターのヘルメットに慣れすぎてしまって、あれは顔の下半分を覆わないんだよな。自分の健康については…正直なところ、全然気にしてない」

languages.text: "Ich bin zu sehr an Arbitrator-Helme gewöhnt – die bedecken den unteren Teil des Gesichts nicht. Und was mein Wohlergehen angeht ... das könnte mich offen gestanden nicht weniger interessieren."
languages.original_text: "I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin zu sehr an Arbitrator-Helme gewöhnt – die bedecken den unteren Teil des Gesichts nicht. Und was mein Wohlergehen angeht ... das könnte mich offen gestanden nicht weniger interessieren."

languages.text: « Je suis trop habitué aux casques d'arbitrators, qui ne couvrent pas le bas du visage. Quant à mon bien-être... à vrai dire, il m'importe peu. »
languages.original_text: "I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis trop habitué aux casques d'arbitrators, qui ne couvrent pas le bas du visage. Quant à mon bien-être... à vrai dire, il m'importe peu. »

languages.text: «Estoy demasiado acostumbrado al casco de Arbitrator, que no cubre la parte inferior de la cara. En cuanto a mi bienestar... sinceramente, me importa un bledo».
languages.original_text: "I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy demasiado acostumbrado al casco de Arbitrator, que no cubre la parte inferior de la cara. En cuanto a mi bienestar... sinceramente, me importa un bledo».

languages.text: “我已经习惯于法务官的头盔了，脸的下半部分是露出来的。至于我的身体健康……说真的，我一点都不在乎。”
languages.original_text: "I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

traits.locale_text: “我已经习惯于法务官的头盔了，脸的下半部分是露出来的。至于我的身体健康……说真的，我一点都不在乎。”

languages.text: "Yargıcı miğferlerine alışmışım. Yüzün alt kısmını kapatmıyorlar. Sağlığıma gelirsek... Açıkçası daha az umurumda olamazdı."
languages.original_text: "I am too used to Arbitrator helmets — they do not cover the lower part of the face. As for my well-being... Frankly, I couldn't care less."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı miğferlerine alışmışım. Yüzün alt kısmını kapatmıyorlar. Sağlığıma gelirsek... Açıkçası daha az umurumda olamazdı."
